Designer, Illustrator, and Front-End Developer

About

I currently live in downtown Chicago, Illinois and work as the Creative Director for Threadmeup.

I also manage a variety of side-projects, watch cheesy, horror movies, and listen to loud music.

Learn More

Skills

My experience, thus far, has been in working with large-scale news media and e-commerce platforms.

I focus on
• UI/UX Design
• Front-End Development
• Rapid Prototyping
• Branding/Identity
• Illustration

  • Bringing the News to the Carribean
    February 14, 2015
    Published in Case-Study
    0 Comments

    It's not every day you get to design a product for entire countries, so when Aggrego was brought in to design Loop, I was definitely excited. Digicel, a communications company that handles phones in the Carribean. They wanted to capitalize on their significant involment in their customers' lives by creating a local news service.

    Continue Reading
  • Redesigning the Pioneer Press
    February 13, 2015
    Published in Case-Study
    0 Comments

    One of the first major projects I worked on at Aggrego was the redesign of the Pioneer Press. The Pioneer Press is a collection of 30+ local news websites covering the Chicago suburbs (under the Chicago Sun-Times umbrella) The goal wasn't simply an aesthetic improvement, but an improvement to the overall product: We made the desktop-only website responsive, added iOS/Android Apps, and created a network to connect them all. Our efforts paid off as the Pioneer Press sites were sold a year later to the Chicago Tribune for $32.5mil.

    Continue Reading
